text: The Longest Day is the 1984 debut album by the Del Fuegos. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== The Del Fuegos: *Dan Zanes - lead vocals, guitar *Warren Zanes - guitar *Tom Lloyd - bass, vocals *Brent "Woody" Giessmann - drums, vocals Additional personnel: *Jorge Bermudez - percussion *Mitchell Froom - keyboards ==External links== * The Longest Day at AllMusic Category:1984 debut albums Category:albums produced by Mitchell Froom Category:Slash Records albums
title: The Longest Day (album)
